title: Homelessness Assistance Application Template
summary: This template is used by individuals who are homeless or at risk of homelessness to formally apply for help under Part 7 of the Housing Act 1996. It supports the legal argument of their eligibility for housing assistance, including personal, household, immigration, or health-related needs.

title: Homelessness Application Review Request Template
summary: Used to challenge a council decision when a homelessness application is denied. Suitable for someone who applied for help and was rejected, and now wishes to review the decision under Section 202 of the Housing Act 1996.
